bookstore.logic.facade

Class BusinessFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • bookstore.logic.facade.BusinessFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBusinessFacade

    public class BusinessFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBusinessFacade
    This class implements the IBusinessFacade. It also implements the Facade Pattern and provides a single view from the logic layer to the presentation layer.

    Pablo Albaladejo Mestre (pablo.albaladejo.mestre@gmail.com)
